special_text:
[+1]: Put a debt counter on up to one target nontoken creature you control. [i](When it dies, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying and decayed for each debt counter on it.)[/i]
[-2]: As an additional cost to activate this ability, sacrifice a creature. Destroy target nonland permanent.
[-8]: Put a debt counter on each creature you control, then destroy all creatures. [i](When it dies, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying and decayed for each debt counter on it.)[/i]
